title: Keeping Children Safe In Education Statutory Guidance 2023 / REF LA F 3

content:
Dear Sheffield City Council,/ REF LA F 3
This request relates to Keeping Children Safe In Education Statutory Guidance 2023 , sections 176-179, published on 6th June 2023 and effective from 1st September 2023.
Please provide me with copies of all correspondence from 1st April 2023 to the present ( including emails) from or to the DFE ( Department for Education) relevant to the implementation of the sections listed above .
Yours faithfully,
John Ormerod
